name: Kindle Share
description: Send e-books (EPUB, PDF, MOBI, AZW3) directly from the detail page to an Amazon Kindle via email.
overview: Adds a 'Send to Kindle' button on book detail pages. Supports per-user Kindle email addresses, SMTP and OAuth2 authentication, and i18n (English/German).

versions.changelog: Added user settings page, OAuth2 admin UI, i18n (EN/DE), 50MB file size limit, improved UX with toast notifications and inline email dialog, expanded format support (MOBI, AZW3), security improvements with [Authorize] attributes and dedicated user email API endpoints.
